items.name: Crema de Chile (Poblano Pepper Cream Soup)
items.description: Onion and cilantro-based cream soup with poblano pepper strips and corn, traditionally served at celebrations in Puebla, Mexico.

items.name: Sopa de Tortilla (Tortilla Soup)
items.description: Crispy tortilla strips and a poached egg submerged in garlic, cilantro and oregano-based broth and topped with sour cream!

items.name: Sopa de Pescado(Fish Soup)
items.description: Fish soup with tilapia and potatoes prepared with onion, garlic and fresh tomatoes — a special dish originating from the coast of Veracruz.

items.name: Enslada Palapa (Palapa House Salad)
items.description: Our own salad creation featuring cucumber, beets, onion, tomato, carrots, no pales (cactus), boiled egg and queso fresco.

items.name: Salpicon de Camaron y Calamar (Tasty Ceviche Variation)
items.description: This famous dish from the Pacific coast includes shrimp and squid mixed with fresh onion, cilantro, tomato, roasted peppers and boiled egg.

items.name: Ensalada de Atun (Tuna Salad)
items.description: Lettuc, onion, tomato and shredded carrots mixed with tuna fish. Your taste buds will tell you, gracias!

items.name: Tamales
items.description: Warm, corn-based dough wrapped in a cornhusk and steam cooked — meat and vegetarian options available.

items.name: Guacamole & Chips
items.description: The best guac in the 'burgh! Served with our homemade tortilla chips.

items.name: Chiles Rellenos (Stuffed Peppers)
items.description: A flavorful dish from Mexico City — banana peppers stuffed with spinach and cheese and topped with green or red sauce.

items.name: Hongos Rellonos al Ajillo (Stuffed Mushrooms in Garlic Sauce)
items.description: Tasty  mushrooms filled with vegetables and topped with garlic sauce — a perfect vegetarian option.

items.name: Nachos
items.description: Homemade tortilla chips topped with melted cheese, corn, black beans, sour cream, pico de gallo, and your choice of beef or chicken — perfect for sharing with friends!

items.name: Camarones a la Diabla (Devil's Shrimp)
items.description: Shrimp sautéed in guajillo pepper sauce — delicious when combined with our guacamole and chips!

items.name: Fajitas Nayarit
items.description: Your choice of chicken, steak or vegetable fajitas, grilled with peppers and pineapple.

items.name: Mole con Pollo (Chicken with Mole)
items.description: Chicken with traditional Mexican mole — the perfect blend of spices, chile peppers and chocolate! So good!

items.name: Puerco en Salsa verde (Pork in Green Sauce)
items.description: Pork shoulder cooked with potatoes and zucchini in our special tomatillo and poblano pepper sauce.

items.name: Cochinita Pibil (Pork with Achiote Sauce)
items.description: This pork dish from the Yucatan peninsula of Mexico is marinated in Achiote sauce and cooked slowly in the oven; it comes with red onion, lime and habanero pepper salsa on the side.

items.name: Cazuela de Pescado (Fish Stew)
items.description: This seafood stew of salmon, tilapia and mussels is cooked in white wine with tomato, garlic and cilantro.

items.name: Barbacoa
items.description: This beef chuck is carefully marinated, then wrapped in banana leaves and steam-cooked. Provecho!

items.name: Tapioca
items.description: Rice pudding infused with cinnamon — a sweet treat for you!

items.name: Flan
items.description: One of our specialties — this custard is made with your choice of coconut or vanilla.

items.name: Tequila Cake
items.description: Moist, fluffy cake baked with a shot of Tequila for extra flavor. Delicious!

items.name: Aguas Frescas
items.description: Refreshing horchata hibiscus, lemonade or seasonal fruit flavors available!
